Item.Name: 57pc ROGERS PRECIOUS MIRROR FLATWARE W/BOX
Item.Description: 57pc ROGERS PRECIOUS MIRROR FLATWARE W/BOX THIS IS A VERY NICE SET OF ROGERS FLATWARE. ITS PRECIOUS MIRROR PATTERN AND THE PIECES ARE : 8-8 1/2 INCH KNIFES , 8-7 INCH SOUP SPOONS , 16-6 INCH TEA SPOONS , 8-7 1/2 INCH FORKS , 8-6 3/4 INCH FORKS , 1-8 3/4 INCH SERVING FORK , 1-6 INCH LADLE , 2-8 1/4 INCH SERVING SPOONS , 1-9 1/2 INCH PIE SERVER , 1-9 INCH VEGETABLE SERVER , 1-7 3/4 INCH TOMATO SERVER , 1-6 INCH SUGAR SPOON , AND 1-6 3/4 INCH BUTTER KNIFE. THE SET IS IN VERY NICE CONDITION WITH NO TABLE WARE AND LITTLE TARNISH. THE CHEST IS MADE WITH DOVE TAIL CONSTRUCTION AND IN GREAT CONDITION. Created by eBay Seller's Assistant Basic.

Item.Name: DEPARTMENT 56 SNOWBABIE MAKE IT SHINE NEW
Item.Description: DEPARTMENT 56 SNOWBABIE MAKE IT SHINE NEW THIS IS A BRANDE NEW DEPARTMENT 56 SNOWBABIE NAMED "MAKE IT SHINE". IT IS MINT IN THE ORIGINAL PACKAGING. THIS IS AN EXCLUSIVE SNOWBABIE AND CAN'T BE BOUGHT IN ANY STORE. THIS BEAUTIFUL SNOWBABIE HAS ANGEL WINGS ON ITS BACK. SHE IS PLACING A SWAROVSKI CRYSTAL STAR ATOP THE CHRISTMAS TREE, WHILE HER PENGUIN FRIEND WATCHES WITH EXCITEMENT. IT MEASURES 3 3/4" H x 3"W AND IS MADE OF BISQUE PORCELAIN, WITH HAND PAINTED FACIAL FEATURES AND HAND APPLIED BISQUE CRYSTALS. PAYMENTS CAN BE MADE BY MONEY ORDERS, CHECKS AND BIDPAY ONLY. Item.Name: DICKENS VILLAGE RETIRED WOOL SHOP W/BOX
Item.Description: Dept 56 Dickens Village Series "WOOL SHOP" (no. 5924-2) issued in 1987 and retired in 1990. There are ivy sided turret rounds out one front corner of the shop. Wood framing around the 3 front windows. The shop is part of the Cobbelstone Shops series. It is in excellent condition along with the original box and sleeve. Buyer will pay actual shipping (and insurance if requested by the buyer-we recommend it since we can not be responsible for the item once it leaves our hands) to be determined at the time of sale. Payment is appreciated in 7 days, auction will be voided if payment is not received within 2 weeks. Money order and cashiers checks will ship the next day. Personal checks are OK but will delay shipping by 7 business days. We have additional hard to find pieces, please let us know if you are looking for a specific one. HAPPY HOLIDAYS! Free Honesty Counters powered by Andale! Payment Details See item description and Payment Instructions, or contact seller for more information. Bid with confidence that you are purchasing from a top seller of Hallmark items. Buyer to pay $4.50 for USPS Priority shipping & handling for ornaments and most other Hallmark items except Kiddie Cars , Insurance is additional based on final value. Shipping Charges are for one item, typically we can ship up to three Hallmark Ornaments based on the total weight at the single item cost. Heavier items when combined will cost a little more. Please see my other Auctions to combine and save $ on shipping costs. Our shipping costs are all based on Priority mail shipping. We do not use shipping costs as a way to make money only to cover the costs of packaging materials and Postage. We do not ship standard mail in the US at reduced rates so please don't ask. Even though our packaging top notch and we have very very few problems or lost mail We assume no liability for items shipped without insurance so if you have any reservations about item damage please ask for insurance. This pricing is for US addresses only. International bidders should contact me before auction ends for a shipping estimate, based on your needs. Payment is expected within 7 days of close of auction. Methods of payment accepted are PayPal, BillPoint Yahoo Paydirect, postal money orders or cashier's checks for immediate shipping upon receipt. Personal checks are also welcome but may delay shipping up to 10 days while check is clearing bank. Returned Checks are subject to a $15.00 handling fee. Item.Name: Good Friends Are For Always 524131 Ornament
Item.Description: This 1992 figurine ornament has a treble clef mark. It comes with its original box and papers. It is in mint condition. This charming girl is holding her bunny. The girl has pastel purple hat, coat, and pants. The hat has a pink pom pom on the top of it with a rough edge look around the brim. She has blond hair. The bunny has a pink bow between its ears and is in a pink dress. Payment Details U.S. Shipping and Handling $4.00 Shipping Insurance per item (optional) $1.10 Sales Tax (none) _ Learn more about checkout Payment Instructions Payment Accepted: Money Order, Cashiers Checks, Billpoint, Paypal. Winning bidder will pay $4.00 for shipping for the 1st piece and $1.00 additional for every extra piece won in the United States. Insurance is an additional $1.10 and is choice of buyer. Without insurance, I do not guarantee the figurine. No returns.

Item.Name: LUCY AND ME LUCY RIGG BEAR PEACE ON EARTH
Item.Description: LUCY AND ME PEACE ON EARTH ENESCO 1992 by Lucy Rigg & Co. Lucy & Me is gone. It is no longer in production. This is a cute piece is a bear dressed as the world, holding a banner that reads" Peace On Earth". Also has a small dove on his head.. Approximately 3 1/4 " in height. You can see by the picture this piece has great coloring. The bottom of the piece has the Lucy and Me markings. Good Luck Bidding. This bear needs a good home! A great addition to the Lucy and Me or bear collector. See my other auctions for Lucy And Me and Lucy Riggs items. BUYER TO PAY $3.50 IN SHIPPING AND DELIVERY, COST ADJUSTED FOR INSURANCE OR SHIPPING OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES. MONEY ORDER OR CASHIERS CHECK ARE PREFERRED METHOD OF PAYMENT.
